text: Borisav Jović (, ; 19 October 1928 – 13 September 2021) was a Serbian communist politician. He served as the Serbian member of the presidency of Yugoslavia during the late 1980s and early 1990s. Jović died on 13 September 2021 at a military hospital in Belgrade, Serbia from COVID-19 at the age of 92.Preminuo Borisav Jović ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Yugoslavian communist politicians Category:Presidents of Yugoslavia Category:Serbian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Belgrade
title: Borisav Jović
